description: The Architects exploit insider information from Daria, leading to targeted disruptions within the BCI, affecting access to public services and causing confusion.
An anonymous group releases footage of BCI malfunctions, demonstrating errors in scoring and access denial, which quickly gains public attention and creates widespread concern.
Authorities discover unexplained data anomalies in the BCI, traced back to exploits matching patterns described in leaked information, indicating deliberate tampering.
Public protests emerge in response to the BCI footage, calling for transparency and reform. The Council is pressured to make a public statement addressing the issues.
The Architects leave cryptic messages embedded in the BCI system, suggesting further vulnerabilities and potential for sabotage.
Government agencies implement temporary fixes to restore BCI stability, but the uncertainty continues to disrupt daily life.
Council convenes an emergency session in an attempt to regain control over the BCI, yet internal disagreements halt decisive action.
